definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment

sentences.english: I remember watching the scissoring competition.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得收看该剪裁的竞争。

sentences.english: To do this we clip the patches' bounding boxes against all six sides of the viewing frustum .
sentences.chinese: 我们用视见体的六个面去剪裁缀片的包围盒。

sentences.english: Combinations of laser cutting, vintage techniques & fine yarns in corded effects.
sentences.chinese: 混合激光剪裁，怀旧技术和精纱塑造立体效果。

sentences.english: Keeps the features of the image while rescaling along a single direction.
sentences.chinese: 当沿单方向剪裁图像时保留图像特性。

sentences.english: The image has been cropped and enhanced to improve contrast.
sentences.chinese: 图像经过剪裁和进行增强处理来提高对比度。
用某一风格设计或者剪裁。

sentences.english: The pruning process is also a step to the right direction.
sentences.chinese: 剪裁过程也是朝正确方向前进的一个步骤。
这件罩衫剪裁得很合身。

sentences.english: My father had a nervous breakdown and cut my homework up to make paper dolls.
sentences.chinese: 我老爸有点神经失常，把作业剪裁开来折纸玩偶了。

sentences.english: High waist cutting and comfortable affixed to the abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 高腰式剪裁，完全包住且自然服贴于腹部不滑落。

sentences.english: Curve cutting of small round neck set the most suitable girl fashion dress.
sentences.chinese: 曲线剪裁的小圆领的套装等最适合少女前卫性穿。

sentences.english: Just try to fool me, you crop tool using liar. [Tree Hugger via Twitter]
sentences.chinese: 想骗我可没门，你这个用了剪裁工具的骗子。

sentences.english: By the cut of your suit, you went to Oxford whatever.
sentences.chinese: 从你衣服的剪裁来看，你读的是牛津一类的学校。

sentences.english: Close-fitting leg has a cropped hem with elasticized binding.
sentences.chinese: 贴身的腿部剪裁下摆有弹性约束力。

sentences.english: Two front pockets in bias cut.
sentences.chinese: 前胸袋口以纵纹剪裁造出斜格效果。

definition: Jacquard weave (machine weaving leaving protruding pattern)
crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
